page.title: 12Family Life in Codnor 1
page.content: My name is Sarah Starbuck. I live in a terraced house with three rooms upstairs and three downstairs. There are four people in my family, my mum and dad, my sister Andrea and me.We have two pet dogs,Kimie and Goldie and my hamster,Hazel. My mum works about twenty-one hours a week in the Qwik Save supermarket in Ripley. I think it is a hard job because she has to learn the prices of over a hundred items and get to know all the regular customers. My dad works as a butcher for Dewhurst's. He has to go to different places each week.Last year he was offered promotion in Sunderland,but we didn't move as we would be too far from our relations. In my spare time I go swimming and I do gardening.My favourite subject at school is Maths. {SS
